articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Doug Parker, architect of merger trend that resulted in four major US airlines, is retiring - CNN
articles.description: Doug Parker will retire in March as CEO of American Airlines, the airline that he made the world's largest through a series of mergers that led to a massive consolidation of the US airline industry.

articles.author: Patt Morrison
articles.title: Before Pearl Harbor, L.A. was home to thriving Japanese communities. Here's what they were like - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: What was life like on Dec. 6, 1941, and in the years before then for one group of people for whom Pearl Harbor would drastically alter their lives — the Japanese and Japanese Americans in Los Angeles?
articles.content:
You know the date Dec. 7 and what happened then, and what happened thereafter, to the United States and to the world.
But what was life like on Dec. 6, 1941, and in the years before then, closer to … [+10931 chars]
